content: this is my attempt at an octopus hat i ve never written a pattern before so i apologize if it doesn t make sense feel free to message me with questions in my design i use oombawka s half_double_crochet hat pattern found here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/basic-half-double-crochet-hat-2 and suzanne m barrow s rosy shells hat found here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rosy-shells-hat--scarf-set i don t wish to pretend they re my work they are both fantastic patterns i give them full credit within the pattern itself since the whole project isn t mine i do not profit on it if you wish to sell the finished project seek permissions from oombawka and suzanne m barrow
